title: Our Story
description: 7 Steps is a provider of match-making services set up to meet the matrimonial needs of a young generation that finds itself at the crossroads of tradition, culture and modernity.

7 Steps, earlier Vedika Matrimony, was founded on the back of the success Vedika Creations has achieved and the trust it has acquired from its clients. Being a resident of the USA, Durga brings a wide array of contacts and rapport with many among the INDIAN Community. As a member of the community, she understands the cultural sensitivities of this group, which is key to providing the match-making services.

7 Steps firmly believes in and operates on the principles of trust and confidentiality. We maintain a database of profiles of single people who seek partners. We conduct strong due diligence to establish the genuineness and veracity of each profile we receive and also treat it with utmost confidentiality. We do not publish profiles on our website or on the internet. We also do not share any contact information when sharing profiles with prospective matches.
We are with you all the way! So get started and register your profile with us now and let us find you a suitable Ideal partner.
